title: "Virtual reality games, eye tracking and machine learning can be used to detect ADHD"
excerpt: "Researchers have used virtual reality games, eye tracking and machine learning to show that differences in eye movements can be used to detect ADHD, potentially providing a tool for more precise diagnosis of attention deficits."
